entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
